# klevu-product-query-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Button that is placed on the site to start a product query session

| Slot                   | Description                  |
| ---------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `"after-button-text"`  | After origin button text     |
| `"after-fineprint"`    | After fineprint in the popup |
